page.title: 13Farming/General Information.
page.content: The farms in the area are hillside farms raising sheep and beef. We surveyed 20 farms and carried out a detailed survey at Pennar Farm, Pentwynmawr owned by Mr.H.Jackson. Of the farms surveyed:- 25% raised beef & sheep. 25% raised beef. 12.5% are dairy farms. 7.5% raised sheep & horses. 7.5% raised beef & horses. 7.5% raised dairy & beef herds. 7.5% raised dairy herds & sheep. 7.5% raised sheep & cattle. 95% of the farms still carried out farming activities and all farmhouses are occupied. Pennar Farm's exact age is not known but from the thickness of the walls (1.25m.) it is an old building. The farm comprises a modernised stone farmhouse, outbuildings and 98 acres of land.
